name: midi
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
covering the upper part of the leg, the knees, and part of the lower leg: a midi dress/skirt Compare
maxi
mini adjective
UK medium sized: She drives around in a yellow Vauxhall midi van. You don't need the biggest size skip - the midi skip should easily be big enough.

Medium-sized
a dress or skirt that covers the upper part of the leg, the knees, and part of the lower leg: I hid my legs behind midis, maxis or trousers. Demure is the new sexy, which means fewer minis and more midis!
